lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic opened the defense of his U.S. Open title with a 6-3 5-7 6-2 6-1 win over Poland's Jerzy Janowicz on Monday, but the labored performance gave rise to fresh concerns about the world number one's fitness.
snippet: Novak Djokovic opened the defense of his U.S. Open title with a 6-3 5-7 6-2 6-1 win over Poland's Jerzy Janowicz on Monday, but the labored performance gave rise to fresh concerns about the world number one's fitness....

headline.main: Djokovic Advances but New Concerns Rise Over Fitness
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Advances but New Concerns Rise Over Fitness
